TopicTitle: Center of mass and center of thrust are too big for small crafts

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel Core i7 9750H | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 | RAM: 16 GB

 

When you build a small craft and turn on showing center of mass or thrust the spheres are too big or in other cases bigger than craft and it's problematic to determine real center of mass or thrust. There are sizes of craft in craft stats. I suggest taking the dimensions from there and adjusting the ball size based on those parameters
